params.text: Mbëfër dafa bëgg ay melo.
Mbëfër dafa gis ay melo.

params.alt: The bear wants to find more colours.
params.title: The bear wants to find more colours.

params.text: Nopp yu mboq
Biir bu sokola

params.alt: The bear has a brown tummy.
params.title: The bear has a brown tummy.

params.text: Géméñ bu xonx
Loxo yu baxa
Ndigg bu nëtëx

params.alt: The bear has a green back.
params.title: The bear has a green back.

params.text: Tank yu roos
Mbëfër bu bëri melo.

params.alt: Oops, the bear has no more colours.
params.title: Oops, the bear has no more colours.

params.text: Am a tul benen melo.

"MELO" story credits

This work, "MELO", is a derivative of "Colours" as translated by Alisha Berger and used under CC BY. The © for this translation lies with Room to Read, 2015. "Colours" is based on the original story: रंग, by Priyanka. © Room to Read, 2015.
